content.question: The hyperbole in the closing sentence (lines 23-24) best conveys the speaker’s

choices.label: distress at imagining the beloved’s death
criticism of the beloved’s many shortcomings
attempt to persuade the beloved to be more careful
satirical humor in relating the beloved’s characteristics

content.answer: distress at imagining the beloved’s death
